DOC.brief_summary: The goal is to study the biology of aging in breast cancer patients, and to study the impact of chemotherapy on aging related blood biomarkers.
DOC.brief_title: Gene Polymorphisms and Gene Products as Biological Markers of Aging and Correlation With Clinical Geriatric Assessment, Tolerance of Chemotherapy and Outcome in Elderly Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: 70 years or older Female Early breast cancer Candidate for systemic adjuvant therapy
